sentence.Network_en: Many people have very strong opinions about the rightness or wrongness of abortion.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多人都对堕胎是否合乎道义有强烈的意见。

sentence.Network_en: A fisherman can explain the wrongness of the weather.
sentence.Network_cn: 渔夫能说明天气的不正常.

sentence.Network_en: The rightness or wrongness of the measures taken is, of course, open to argument.
sentence.Network_cn: 采取的措施是对是错自然是有争议的.

means.word_mean: 3. the quality of not conforming to fact or truth

auth_sentence.content: Though obviously the title invited that kind of wrongness.

auth_sentence.content: You'd have to weigh up the wrongness of what they'd done against the damage it could do to their future employment prospects.
